title: Cranberry Sauce
directions: Combine sugar, orange juice, Fireball, and water in a large saucepan over medium heat. Stir to combine and bring to a simmer.
Add cranberries, salt, cinnamon stick, and Orange zest.
Decrease to a low heat and stir regularly.
Continue cooking until all, or most, of the cranberries have popped.
Let cool for at least 30 minutes. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.
Can be made up to 3 days in advance.
ingredients: 12 oz fresh cranberries rinsed and picked through
